doc:
Buddy Foster https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buddy_Foster 0 Lucius Fisher "Buddy" Foster IV (born July 12, 1957) is an American former child actor. Beginning his professional acting career at the age of eight, Foster is perhaps best known for his roles in various television series throughout the late 1960s and early 1970s. He is the older brother of actress and director Jodie Foster. Lucius_Fisher_"_Buddy_"_Foster_IV ( born July_12_,_1957 ) is an_American_former_child_actor . Beginning his_professional_acting_career at the_age of eight , Foster is_perhaps_best_known for his_roles in various_television_series throughout the_late_1960s and early_1970s . He is the_older_brother of actress_and_director_Jodie_Foster .
